description: Provides technical and conceptual guidance for understanding and contributing to NovaAI’s systems and structure.

structure.purpose: Offers clear instructions for navigating NovaAI’s design, contributing to her development, and expanding her modular systems.

anchored_in_faith.message: The beginning of wisdom is this: Get wisdom, and whatever you get, get insight.

long_term: Develop additional guides for onboarding new contributors.
Create a comprehensive User Guide for relational engagement.
